'''Elrond's Holy Round Table: Essays on Tolkien, Sayers and the Arthur Saga''' is the [[1990]] issue of ''[[Lembas (journal)|Lembas-extra]]'', published by [[Unquendor]]. It was edited by [[René van Rossenberg]].

==Contents==
* [[René van Rossenberg]]: "Preface"
* [[Renée Vink]]: "The Frameless Picture"
* [[Arti Ponsen]]: "On Tolkien and Some Rehash"
* [[Jerry Nieukoop]]: "The Loosing End"
* [[Renée Vink]]: "The Image of the Maker"
* [[René van Rossenberg]]: "Bilbo Baggins and the Beeb"
* [[Nathalie Kotowski]] and [[René van Rossenberg]]: "Comrade Frodo and Hobbitania: Tolkien in Russian"
